page.title: 09THE MEDIA IN DIPTON.
page.content:
{A SURVEY OF 100 MEN & 100 WOMEN GIVING {THE TOP ANSWERS TO EACH QUESTION.}
T.V.Favourite Soap Opera.{DALLAS}21.5% Which Channel do you watch most? {I.T.V.}55% How many TV.sets in your house? 100% {100 people had 2 or more sets. Which Daily,Morning Newspaper,do you read?{......The DAILY MIRROR...26.5% Do you own a Video Recorder?{NO..63% Do you own a Radio?........{YES 99.5% Which Station do you listen to most? {METRO RADIO.(Local Independent Station Who is your Fav.Author?{C.COOKSON. 17% Are you a member of a local Library? { { YES.....51% Which Mag. or Comic do you buy? { { 52% did NOT buy anything. } If you buy L.P'S, do you prefer a disc or a Cassette?{...........DISC.....51% { }
